linesOfText.text:
Thank you God
for creating me,

You made all the delicate,
inner parts of my body
and knit me together
in my mother’s womb.

You have known me
through eternity,

"I knew you
before I formed you
in your mother’s womb.

Before you were born
I set you apart ..."

You have blessed me
with a heavenly home,

Jesus said,

"Let the little children
come to me, and do not
hinder them, for the
kingdom of heaven belongs
to such as these."

And through your blessings
I am never alone.

Then he put a little child
among them.

Taking the child in his arms,
he said to them,

"Anyone who welcomes
a little child like this
on my behalf welcomes me,
and anyone who welcomes
me welcomes not only me
but also my Father
who sent me."

Your protecting angels
bring me peace,

"Beware that you don’t
look down on any
of these little ones.

For I tell you
that in heaven their
angels are always in
the presence
of my heavenly Father."

In your loving arms
I can be free.

For God so loved
the world; that He gave
His only begotten Son,
that whoever believes
in Him shall not perish,
but have eternal life.
